content.html: You’re sending an internal survey to all your devs to figure out the current state of engineering velocity, reliability, productivity, morale, and business impact. What question are you definitely including? twitter.com/i/web/status/1…
content.value:
You’re sending an internal survey to all your devs to figure out the current state of engineering velocity, reliability, productivity, morale, and business impact.
